name: Cheese Forest
description:
Cheese forest is a game where you have to figure out why this forest called Cheese forest is so strange. this forest was given its name due to big blocks of cheese  being placed around it, but why? You will need to collect notes and use them as advice to stop whatever will happen.  And the cheese might come in handy. 

WASD - Move

E - Interact

L Shift - Sprint

L Control - Crouch

F - Toggle Flashlight

Right Mouse Button - Examine / Zoom

Space - Jump

Tab - Inventory / Pause

Esc - Inventory / Pause

99% of what was used to make this games are not mine beside the idea of the game. There is a text document which gives credit most (I forget where I got some of the items) of the used models/texture/fonts/audio.

currently this game is only a demo and thus only a small part of it that will definably see changes in the future if there are literally any problems tell me so I can fix them, if a tree is slightly misplaced tell me, if a rock dosint have collision tell me, if you cant even jump of a block of cheese tell me.

I will read every comment, if you have an idea or a suggest feel free to comment them bellow, obviously the game isn't out so things will change.
